summary: The Chief Executive Officer of a video game company called "Leek Cartridge", Pop transforms into the grey bunny Dopamine using the "digital clock wind" wristband. When she transforms, she says "Appear, Dopamine!" and can call wild birds with a whistle. She is the dark-skinned girl who always wears hats. She is usually the one who comes up with the plan to defeat the monsters. Dopamine is a chemical in the brain which affects adrenalin and the functions of memory, attention, and problem-solving.
name: ポップ
